documents.document: RT @dipper11111: Dad would have been 65 today hope he is looking down saying well done! The homestead in the background was were my great gâ€¦
RT @Rice1John: BBC News - Suffolk pig farm hopes flowers will feed bumblebees https://t.co/FrBPRsu2et
RT @willpenrievans: What a fantastic story @FarmersGuardian - Good luck for the launch @peck_drinks ðŸ’ªðŸ¼ðŸ” https://t.co/hNZKqhVbjD
RT @essexwindyfarm: @louisearable @farmingfred @SmallRobotHarry @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @willpenrievans @cutlerstom Weâ€¦

@beakerson @willpenrievans @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @essexwindyfarm @farmingfred @cutlerstom @sparky000 Yes we're very mindful of all that - responsible and ethical robotics. Fostering rural regeneration rather than killing jobs.
@roaringsurffarm @willpenrievans @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @essexwindyfarm @farmingfred @cutlerstom @sparky000 John Deere was a case study on what to avoid there I believe...! ðŸ˜‚

@roaringsurffarm @willpenrievans @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @essexwindyfarm @farmingfred @cutlerstom @sparky000 And at a per hectare cost so affordable on small scale too (big ag can't deliver economies of scale to smaller farms). And yes, farmers would own their own data!!!

@roaringsurffarm @willpenrievans @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @essexwindyfarm @farmingfred @cutlerstom @sparky000 Yup, all issues we've had come up in our farmer consultations to design our tech - we're therefore delivering as a service, so you don't have to fix/worry about being nicked etc. Instead you buy a healthy crop.

@essexwindyfarm @tomallenstevens @Farmer_Tom_UK @LinesMartin @willpenrievans @farmingfred @cutlerstom @sparky000 a few more comments in the thread and also @driverfarms1 said he could chat! Many thanks to you all!

@ProagriLtd We're hoping for up to 95% reduction in chemicals with our agritech robots which may render future bans needless - as per research from @HarperAdamsUni which we're basing our tech on - precise application only when needed, not blanket spraying. Field trials start this October!

Help make farming nature friendly! I'm voting for @smallrobotco sustainable farming #robotics in the @Tech4GoodAwards helping to transform farming, cutting chemicals to save #bees and #wildlife. Please retweet to add your vote! #T4GSmallRobot @NFFNUK @Groundswellaguk https://t.co/ZWuL4RvgxM

@theASE @sweetgeorgiab_ FYI We are already supporting STEM initiatives eg a Summer Camp with Bristol Robotics Lab and a sixth form college scheme with Fareham College and are planning a number of school visits as part of our activity in the next academic year.

@theASE @sweetgeorgiab_ Just saw this from @sweetgeorgiab_ We would love to support this! Happy to add to your prizes eg a robot school visit from our Small Robots for sustainable farming (plus KS1/2/3 coding challenges), and some budding farmer kits? DM me if interested.
